name: Context Steering
description:
Introduction:
This project was created in order for me to learn 'Context Steering AI'. I haven't found any source codes regarding this topic so I decide to create my own.

The AI capability is represented in the form of 'Tag' game. At the start of the game the player is 'it' and will need to chase other AI in the stage. The arrow above the player indicate who is 'it'.

Control:
WASD - Move Player
